meta.description: Ben Shapiro shilled for the Coronavirus "death jab" "clot shot," blasting those against accepting the experimental mRNA cocktail.

title: Ben Shapiro Shilled For The Coronavirus Vaccine And Blasted Farrakhan For Stoking 'Vaccine Hesitancy'
cleaned_text:
Neoconservative pundit Ben Shapiro shilled for the Coronavirus injection, stating that he received the injection as did his wife and his parents. Ben Shapiro also blasted black nationalist leader Louis Farrakhan of the Nation of Islam for supposedly promoting “vaccine hesitancy,” a term that demonizes people who rightly decided not to take the jab.

People are dying suddenly after taking the Coronavirus jab that was backed by Ben Shapiro, and the establishment is now panicking to stem the tide of public awakening. Unfortunately for the globalists, the pundits who shilled for the so-called “clot shot” may always be remembered for their shilling, because the Truth movement has the receipts.

Ben Shapiro’s establishment syndicator Cumulus Media actually mandated the jab for employees, prompting the firing of former Cumulus host Doc Washburn, who refused to get injected.

The conservative pundit class uses the partisan divide in the 2-party paradigm to push for subversive objectives that do not actually benefit their conservative audience. Shapiro shilling for the vaccine and demonizing “vaccine hesitancy,” using the supposedly left-wing boogeyman of Farrakhan, is an example of subversive punditry. Shapiro shilled for the vaccine from a partisan political standpoint, but he shilled for the vaccine nonetheless.

You might notice conservative pundits trying to “out-left the Left” on various matters by shilling for left-wing objectives while trying to present Republicans as being even more sympathetic to immigrants or left-wing racial grievance groups. Do you see how they rig the talking points so that people on both “sides” come to the same subversive conclusions?

In July 2021, Ben Shapiro tweeted, “I got the vaccine. My wife got the vaccine. My parents got the vaccine.”

Unfortunately for the consumers of “conservative” media, Shapiro’s salesmanship of the so-called clot shot death jab doesn’t mark the first time he’s shilled for the radical leftism of the globalist uni-party.

Neoconservative pundit Ben Shapiro of shilled for the bipartisan Uniparty movement to replace White people in America through mass migration, echoing the ideology of Jewish identitarian groups like the Anti-Defamation League (ADL). Shapiro tweeted a racially-charged, anti-White message on June 16, 2017, during the first year of the Donald Trump presidency. Shapiro tweeted, “And by the way, I don’t give a good damn about the so-called ‘browning of America.’ Color doesn’t matter. Ideology does.”

Read More: Ben Shapiro Shilled For the Replacement of White People In America

Roughly a year prior to Shapiro’s tweeting of that anti-White message, he was calling President Trump a “liar” in a viral social media video published by the Daily Wire and full of left-wing talking points.

The video was cut during the 2016 presidential campaign, a time in which Shapiro viciously opposed future President Trump, alongside other members of the self-proclaimed Never Trump movement.

When the Never Trumpers failed to block Trump’s election as the 45th President, Shapiro put his anti-Trump views under wraps and monetized the Trump presidency alongside the GOP establishment.

Flashback: Ben Shapiro Starred in ‘Donald Trump Is A Liar’ Before Monetizing his Presidency
